Messages.pages.not-found.description: Strona, której szukasz, mogła zostać usunięta, zmieniła nazwę lub jest tymczasowo niedostępna.

Messages.pages.home.hero.title: Pobierz Freesm Launcher na
Messages.pages.home.hero.description: Freesm Launcher to jest niestandardowy launcher do Minecrafta, który pozwala grać na koncie offline bez żadnych ograniczeń.
Messages.pages.home.features.more-auth-servers.de: Korzystaj z kont offline bez ograniczeń lub z Ely.by i innych niestandardowych serwerów uwierzytelniających, aby grać w Minecrafta.
Messages.pages.home.features.customization.title: Personalizacja
Messages.pages.home.features.customization.descri: Freesm Launcher posiada własny motyw w kolorach Catppuccin i ikonach Microsoft Fluent. Umożliwia także ustawianie animowanych paczek kotów z obsługą przycinania tła.
Messages.pages.home.features.prism.title: Na bazie Prism
Messages.pages.home.features.prism.description: Freesm opiera się na kodzie Prism Launcher, więc możesz oczekiwać wszystkich jego funkcji, takich jak zarządzanie modpackami i instancjami.
Messages.pages.home.features.other.title: Inne funkcje
Messages.pages.home.features.other.description: Automatycznie kopiuj zrzuty ekranu z gry do historii schowka, pokazuj swoją obecną instancję na Discordzie, korzystaj ze skinów Ely.by wszędzie i wiele więcej!
Messages.pages.home.team.maintainers.title: Maintainers
Messages.pages.home.team.maintainers.list.kaeeraa: Problem-solver at heart, passionate about Linux (NixOS) and open-source apps.
Messages.pages.home.team.maintainers.list.s0me1ne: OSS Enthusiast, creator of the idea. Nix stuff maintainer also known as hand7s
Messages.pages.home.team.contributors.title: Contributors
Messages.pages.home.team.special.title: Specjalne podziękowania
Messages.pages.downloads.title: Downloads
Messages.pages.faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
Messages.pages.faq.description: A collection of helpful information for frequent problems when using Freesm Launcher.
Messages.pages.faq.issues.long-launch.title: Instance launching problems
Messages.pages.faq.issues.long-launch.description: Try enabling or disabling your VPN or zapret. If it didn't work, try changing your Java vendor or version in settings.
Messages.pages.faq.issues.no-versions-available.d: Try enabling or disabling your VPN or zapret. If it didn't work, try putting https://meta.multimc.org/v1/ in Settings -> APIs -> Metadata Server.
Messages.pages.faq.issues.portable-zip.title: 'Java checker could not be found. Please check your installation'
Messages.pages.faq.issues.portable-zip.descriptio: You probably downloaded a portable version of the launcher and didn't unzip/unarchive it.
Messages.pages.faq.issues.optifine.title: How to install OptiFine without a mod loader?
Messages.pages.faq.issues.optifine.description: Original Example for 1.8.9: * Go into \FreesmLauncher\libraries\com\mojang\minecraft\1.8.9\ and copy the minecraft jar file * Make a new folder directory %appdata%\.minecraft\versions\1.8.9\ and paste the jar in there * Then rename the jar you just pasted to 1.8.9.jar * Try extracting it and put the extracted file into \FreesmLauncher\libraries\com\mojang\minecraft\1.8.9\
Messages.pages.faq.issues.skins.title: How to set a skin?
Messages.pages.faq.issues.skins.description: Try using an Ely.by skins system, or install a mod that allows you to change in-game skins.
Messages.pages.faq.issues.microsoft-invalid-login: Don't sign in using a Microsoft account if you didn't buy the game. You need to use an 'Offline'/'Ely.by' option in account settings in this case (servers will still work).
Messages.pages.faq.issues.no-languages.title: Why is there only an english language in the launcher?
Messages.pages.faq.issues.no-languages.descriptio: Try enabling or disabling your VPN or zapret.
Messages.pages.faq.issues.cat-pack-quality.title: My cat packs have a bit lower quality when using them in Freesm
Messages.pages.faq.issues.cat-pack-quality.descri: Will be fixed in the future ^.^
Messages.pages.faq.issues.other.title: Still doesn't work/Other issues
Messages.pages.faq.issues.other.description: Check Prism Launcher FAQ or try contacting us at Discord or Telegram.
Messages.pages.themes.title: Theme Generator
Messages.pages.themes.description: The easiest way to make simple Freesm/Prism Launcher themes. Note that this preview may have inaccuracies!

Messages.launcher.confirm-deletion.description:
Zamierzasz usunąć «%s».
Może to być trwałe i całkowicie usunie instancję.

Czy na pewno chcesz kontynuować?
